review: The Chrome is good, but it needs a more responsive control system. We use a Chrome on two different TVs and use our Android phones to control them. I really enjoy using the Chrome with things like HBO GO, but if I am watching a show and need to pause, waking up the phone and getting the Chrome to pause, and stay paused, sometimes takes too long and I have to tell folks on the phone to hang on while I wait for the show to pause. I since then have bought two Amazon Fire Sticks, and the remote that comes with them is exactly what is needed with the Chrome. HBO GO is not yet available on the Fire Stick, that, and how much easier it is to get some of my home media to stream to the Chrome means that the Chrome wins out in these areas. It is a hard choice between them, and I use both the Fire Stick and the Chrome, but if I am streaming something that I can get on either the Chrome or Fire Stick, the Fire Stick is my choice due to its remote.
